content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace Smelting Setup at position (-13.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at (-13.0, -50.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Output Burner Inserter at (-14.5, -51.5) with drop position at (-13.5, -51.5).
- Input Burner Inserter at (-16.5, -49.5) now configured with pickup at (-17.5, -49.5) and drop position updated to (-15.5, -49.5).
- Attempted transport belt linkage from (-13.5, -51.5) toward (-17.5, -49.5) with associated belt groups:
  - BeltGroup with an input belt from (-12.5, -52.5) to (-14.5, -52.5) and output belt from (-17.5, -51.5) to (-17.5, -49.5).
  - Additional BeltGroup connecting from (-14.5, -51.5) to (-12.5, -51.5).

### Iron Ore Mining Setup with Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at (-15.0, -50.0) (noted with a warning "out of fuel").
- Sink Wooden Chest at (-15.5, -51.5) collecting mined ore.

### Additional Logistic Chest
Consists of:
- Wooden Chest at (-14.5, -48.5) (likely serving as auxiliary storage).

ERROR TIPS
- Crafting Ingredient Shortages:
  • Transport belt crafting failures due to missing iron-plate sub-ingredients.
  • Gear wheel crafting errors because of insufficient iron-plate, cascading from missing sub-ingredients.
- Furnace Production Delays:
  • Repeated timeouts while waiting for the furnace to produce enough iron plates for gear wheel crafting.
  • Ensure a steady ore supply and manage extraction timing to avoid production stalls.
- Extraction and Entity Connection Failures:
  • Extraction errors when attempting to retrieve iron plates from the furnace; verify the presence of the item in the source entity.
  • Transport belt connection failures caused by absence of required items in inventory before connecting inserters to belts.
- Fuel and Operational Warnings:
  • Burner mining drill and burner inserter warnings (e.g., “out of fuel”) indicate the need to regularly refuel to maintain operations.
